generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface extending from the foreground into the distance, with visible lane markings and curbs, is designated for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: The paved path on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and where pedestrians are walking, is designated for pedestrians.
- building: The pink and beige multi-story structure with windows and a balcony on the left, as well as other buildings visible in the background, are clearly buildings.
- fence: The dark metal fence running along the right side of the sidewalk, separating it from the greenery, is a fence.
- pole: The small, dark, vertically oriented posts with chains connecting them along the left side of the road are poles.
- vegetation: The large, leafy trees on the right side of the road and the greenery behind the fence are vegetation.
- terrain: The grassy area behind the fence on the right side of the road is terrain.
- sky: The bright, open area visible above the buildings and trees in the background is the sky.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz emblem visible in the center of the image indicates the presence of a car, viewed from the driver's perspective.
